entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -20.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
